content:
Hi All,

I was looking at the resources for Inferno Reference server this morning and found that few resources are getting skipped. Skipped resources are DiagnosticReport For Report And Note Exchange Tests, DiagnosticReport For Laboratory Results Reporting Tests, DocumentReference Tests, MedicationRequest Tests, Provenance Tests.

One of the message for Medication request is "Could not find the following resource type references:reported:Patient,Practitioner,Organization;requester:Organization,Patient,Device". This was not happening last week. Could you please give us some guidance on why this is happening?

Here is the saved link for reference server tests. https://inferno.healthit.gov/inferno/hi3OHZ7ODYJ/

Thank You

On Monday we released an update to the tests that include more thorough MUST SUPPORT checking. We expect to have an updated data set on our reference servers soon (within days) that includes the extra data that is now needed to pass (not skip) those tests.
@Michael O'Keefe is working on that now.
